Page Six reports that outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt is in talks with "Parker Spitzer" executive producer Liza McGuirk on a new show that he would host. The two first connected on the Sunday foreign-affairs program " Fareed Zakaria GPS, which McGuirk executive produced and where Eric Schmidt was a regular guest. When Eric Schmidt filmed a pilot for CNN in August, McGuirk oversaw the production. "
